text: Gaal ga helekai, “Gidaadou la nia daangada hai behee i Shechem? Gidaadou e ngalua gi Abimelech eiaha? Mee koai? Mee la tama daane ni Gideon! Gei Zebul e daudali nnelekai a Abimelech, gei gidaadou e aha ala e hai hegau gi mee? Hagalongo gi godou damana maadua go Hamor9.28 Genesis 33.19; 34.2, dela ne haga duu aga di godou madahaanau damana!
